text: Tarapara sayatana tadera kumantrana dile yena se tadera kache prakasa karate pare tadera lajjara bisayera ya tadera kache gopana chila, ta'i se balale -- ''tomadera prabhu e'i gachera theke tomadera nisedha karena ni e'i jan'ya chara ye tomara phiris‌ta haye yabe kimba tomara habe cirajibidera antarbhukta.’’
